Unravel 4.4 : Cloudera Distribution Including Apache Hadoop (CDH), with Cloudera Manager (CM)

Created by katch, last modified by Bala Venkatrao on Oct 26, 2018

confluence-information-macro confluence-information-macro-tip

This guide is compatible with

  • CDH 4.5 - 5.14
  • Hive versions 0.10.0 through 1.2.x
  • Spark versions 1.3, 1.5, 1.6, 2.0

Ordered Steps

  • Step 1: Install Unravel Server on CDH+CM
  • Step 2: Install Unravel Sensor Parcel on CDH+CM
  • Step 3: Enable Impala APM

confluence-information-macro has-no-icon confluence-information-macro-information

Unravel’s Reports:

  • Sessions,
  • Cluster Optimization,
  • Capacity Forecasting, and
  • Small Files

require that you use MySQL as your database and install Unravel’s Ondemand. See Installing Ondemand for installation instructions.

For more information on installations and configurations see Advanced Topics.
